𓂥 ⇔ 𓂓 kar

𓂥 ≈ 𓂝 ⋆Carp! ⲕⲁϩ ⇔ 𓐍𓂋𓊪𓂥 carry

D44 𓂥 GRP grap/kerb/carve 𓂥 Kraft 𓐍 𓊪 𓈙 𓄘 𓄻

𓐍 𓂋 𓊪 𓅱 𓍊 | mallet | club 𓂥 ⇔ Krüppel 𓐍 𓈖 𓂥 Knüppel

𓐍 𓂋 𓊪 𓂥 | bring, provide, make offering of, dedicate | carry < carpe +++ 𓐍 𓂋 𓊪 𓂥 | drive (cattle), lead, get ahead (with work), undertake (works) | carry < carpe +++ 𓐍 𓂋 𓊪 𓂥 | govern, control, administer, act as controller, direct (someone) | govern < carpe +++

𓐍 𓂋 𓊪 𓂥 | controller, administrator | Karpo™ 𓐍 𓂋 𓊪 𓂥 𓄣 𓏤 | having authority | ← / controll -- / crown … / kuro / kurp / grow
